div.pre: 272 Delos, 1959 Burial: c. 140-135 B.C. (T); c. 110 (Lewis) Contents: 36 AR. From excavations Athens: 34 New Style tetradr. 2 New Style dr. Disposition: Myconos â€ Varoucha, A Delt 1961-62, Chronika, pp. 5-6, some illus. Hackens, BCH 1965, pp. 515-6 (32 tetradr., 2 dr. seen at Myconos)
